cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on July 27, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4609, National Institute of Standards and Technology for the Future Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 128 (Wednesday, July 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. STEVENS:
H.R. 4609.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H3803]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 177.

title: National Institute of Standards and Technology for the Future Act of 2021
